title: Martinsfeelz65
author: Martinsfeelz65
content: Hi Everyone, am offering loan services to people only from USA, with good reputation and a form of collateral. Am lending within a range of $100 to $1000. I will need some personal details about before I proceed and Verification Anyone who wants to reach out can contact me at martinharts65@gmail.com

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I hope no one is naive enough to fall into your trap. The three red tags in your profile and the active flag against you should be enough, but just in case there are some clueless people, it is better to warn them not to fall into the trap of a scammer like you.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on August 12, 2023, 07:45:21 AMI hope no one is naive enough to fall into your trap. The three red tags in your profile and the active flag against you should be enough, but just in case there are some clueless people, it is better to warn them not to fall into the trap of a scammer like you.Any user who ignores all the warnings on OP's profile and goes ahead to deal with him will be so stupid, and I won't feel any remorse for them. In fact, I have added my support for the flag though I wonder why Timelord2067 opposed the flag, yet I have always seen him have a strong stance against lending board scammers and potential scammers.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 12, 2023, 02:16:39 PMIn fact, I have added my support for the flag though I wonder why Timelord2067 opposed the flag, yet I have always seen him have a strong stance against lending board scammers and potential scammers.Are you one of those who take Timelord2067 seriously? I'm not surprised that he opposed this flag or anything he might do at this point. I know many people still trust him but I put him on ignore some time ago because he is too conspiratorial with alts and such.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on August 12, 2023, 07:45:21 AMI hope no one is naive enough to fall into your trap. The three red tags in your profile and the active flag against you should be enough, but just in case there are some clueless people, it is better to warn them not to fall into the trap of a scammer like you.I agree with you that no one is naive enough to fall into such useless traps, and I think especially no one on this forum will fall for such traps because on this forum most members are quite smart and they can easily smell such scams. The thread of @OP is nothing but a trap and I think no will care to provide even a pic of their knee to such scammers.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on August 21, 2023, 05:23:15 PMI agree with you that no one is naive enough to fall into such useless traps, and I think especially no one on this forum will fall for such traps because on this forum most members are quite smart and they can easily smell such scams. The thread of @OP is nothing but a trap and I think no will care to provide even a pic of their knee to such scammers. He's been doing this since 2020 had an offer like this back in 2021 where he first got tagged and now he posted again this year, he is not serious about giving a loan he just wants your information, so far there's no complaint against him but that does not mean that people should not be careful on his offer, it's a trap when he asks for confidential details, your sensitive information is not worth hundreds of dollars not even a thousand dollars, especially to an anonymous person.
